changelog.change: · add compatibility for v354 and later
· fixes a possible issue with caches clearing on v359 and later
· fixes reels showing ads on v359 and later
· reduce long pressing on home icon to open settings
· update ipa to newer Instagram v363.0
· fixes long pressing reels on dm to show origin context menu
· add more compatibility for Instagam v358.0
· add clearing the temp folder along with caches when clearing the caches
· fixes hide all tabs with newer insta v354 and later
· add clear caches in contribute section
· update ipa to newer Instagram v358.0

descriptionlist.longdescription:
In App Purchase: $2.99

In App Settings:
· To enter the settings, either long press on home button in tabbar or Instagram text logo.
· Download Video from posts, IGTV, Reels, etc. (HD | SD)
· Save Images from posts, Stories, & profiles
· Block all promo ads
· Quick seen/unseen Stories/DM's button
· Keep unsent messages
· Copy various text like comments, descriptions, bios, etc.
· Various confirmation prompts on double tap likes
· Lock the app
· And many more settings...


IPA & TrollStore Version?
  • Instructions from here...


    • · OR copy this source and add it to ur source list on Altstore, Esign etc..
    · https://ikghd.site/repo.json

    Refund Policy:
    · Refund accepted if you encounter issues such as safe mode or the tweak not working.
    · Must provide full details about the issue, including photos & crash logs.
    · Change of mind is not accepted; you can see details with photos & videos before buying.
    · If refund is accepted, processing will take 3 to 7 days.
    · Thank you 🤗 & enjoy!


    Subscription | Key & Devices:
    · 1-year subscription (364 days).
    · The key is for 1 device and is transferable.


    Refer to the FAQ page for more info:
